column4: I'm trying to copy the mboxes over from the Windows version of Thunderbird to the Ubuntu version, but I can't remember which mbox goes with which email account...I was wondering if there was any file in the profile that would tell me that....I realize it's not exactly an Ubuntu question, but the folks on Mozilla.org are largely lurking and saying nothing
you can open the Account Settings window and look at the "Server Settings" page for each account. it has a Local Directory thing there
which means I'll need to reboot into Windows...ah well, was hoping I could avoid doing that
well, the alternative is to try and interpret the "prefs.js" file yourself ;-)
